HOME.DESCRIPTION: Learn, understand, and support those living with epilepsy.
HOME.FEATURE_1_DESC: Access comprehensive guides and articles about epilepsy types, triggers, and treatments.
HOME.FEATURE_2_DESC: Learn essential first aid steps to help someone during a seizure.
HOME.FEATURE_3_DESC: Test your knowledge and debunk common myths about epilepsy.
HOME.EXPERT_1_QUOTE: "Surgery is underutilized in epilepsy, yet it offers the best chance of seizure freedom for patients resistant to drug treatments."
HOME.EXPERT_2_QUOTE: "Epilepsy is not limited to seizures: it affects all aspects of the patient's life. Treatments must aim for quality of life, not just seizure control."
HOME.RESEARCH_DESC: Discover the latest clinical advances and case studies on different types of epileptic seizures.
HOME.CASE_1_DESC: "Localize to heal better." This case illustrates how advanced imaging helps identify hippocampal sclerosis.
HOME.CASE_2_DESC: "Understanding triggers in daily life." Focus on awakening seizures in adolescents and sleep management.
HOME.CASE_3_DESC: "Beyond the appearance of inattention." Analysis of brief contact breaks in children and EEG diagnosis.
